verses.verse: And <WH935>, behold, there came a man <WH376> of God <WH430> out of Judah <WH3063> by the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> unto Beth-el <WH1008>: and Jeroboam <WH3379> was standing <WH5975> by the altar <WH4196> to burn incense <WH6999>.

And he cried <WH7121> against the altar <WH4196> by the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068>, and said <WH559>, O altar <WH4196>, altar <WH4196>, thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>: Behold <WH1121>, a son shall be born <WH3205> unto the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732>, Josiah <WH2977> by name <WH8034>; and upon thee shall he sacrifice <WH2076> the priests <WH3548> of the high places <WH1116> that burn incense <WH6999> upon thee <WH120>, and men's bones <WH6106> shall they burn upon thee <WH8313>.

And he gave <WH5414> a sign <WH4159> the same day <WH3117>, saying <WH559>, This is the sign <WH4159> which Jehovah <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696>: Behold <WH4196>, the altar shall be rent <WH7167>, and the ashes <WH1880> that are upon it shall be poured out <WH8210>.

And it came to pass <WH4428>, when the king heard <WH8085> the saying <WH1697> of the man <WH376> of God <WH430>, which he cried <WH7121> against the altar <WH4196> in Beth-el <WH1008>, that Jeroboam <WH3379> put forth <WH7971> his hand <WH3027> from the altar <WH4196>, saying <WH559>, Lay hold <WH8610> on him <WH3027>. And his hand, which he put forth <WH7971> against him <WH3001>, dried up, so that he could <WH3201> not draw it back again to him <WH7725>.

The altar <WH4196> also was rent <WH7167>, and the ashes <WH1880> poured out <WH8210> from the altar <WH4196>, according to the sign <WH4159> which the man <WH376> of God <WH430> had given <WH5414> by the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068>.

And the king <WH4428> answered <WH6030> and said <WH559> unto the man <WH376> of God <WH430>, Entreat <WH2470> now the favor <WH6440> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, and pray <WH6419> for me <WH3027>, that my hand may be restored me again <WH7725>. And the man <WH376> of God <WH430> entreated <WH2470> Jehovah <WH3068>, and the king <WH4428>'s hand <WH3027> was restored him again <WH7725>, and became as it was before <WH7223>.
And the king <WH4428> said <WH1696> unto the man <WH376> of God <WH430>, Come <WH935> home <WH1004> with me <WH5582>, and refresh thyself <WH5414>, and I will give thee a reward <WH4991>.

And the man <WH376> of God <WH430> said <WH559> unto the king <WH4428>, If thou wilt give <WH5414> me half <WH2677> thy house <WH1004>, I will not go in <WH935> with thee <WH398>, neither will I eat bread <WH3899> nor drink <WH8354> water <WH4325> in this place <WH4725>;

for so was it charged <WH6680> me by the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068>, saying <WH559>, Thou shalt eat <WH398> no bread <WH3899>, nor drink <WH8354> water <WH4325>, neither return <WH7725> by the way <WH1870> that thou camest <WH1980>.
So he went <WH3212> another <WH312> way <WH1870>, and returned <WH7725> not by the way <WH1870> that he came <WH935> to Beth-el <WH1008>.

Now there dwelt <WH3427> an <WH259> old <WH2205> prophet <WH5030> in Beth-el <WH1008>; and one of his sons <WH1121> came <WH935> and told <WH5608> him all the works <WH4639> that the man <WH376> of God <WH430> had done <WH6213> that day <WH3117> in Beth-el <WH1008>: the words <WH1697> which he had spoken <WH1696> unto the king <WH4428>, them also they told <WH5608> unto their father <WH1>.

And their father <WH1> said <WH1696> unto them <WH1870>, What way went <WH1980> he <WH1121>? Now his sons had seen <WH7200> what <WH335> way <WH1870> the man <WH376> of God <WH430> went <WH1980>, that came <WH935> from Judah <WH3063>.
And he said <WH559> unto his sons <WH1121>, Saddle <WH2280> me the ass <WH2543>. So they saddled <WH2280> him the ass <WH2543>; and he rode thereon <WH7392>.

And he went <WH3212> after <WH310> the man <WH376> of God <WH430>, and found <WH4672> him sitting <WH3427> under an oak <WH424>; and he said <WH559> unto him <WH376>, Art thou the man of God <WH430> that camest <WH935> from Judah <WH3063>? And he said <WH559>, I am.
Then he said <WH559> unto him <WH3212>, Come home <WH1004> with me <WH398>, and eat bread <WH3899>.

And he said <WH559>, I may <WH3201> not return <WH7725> with thee <WH935>, nor go in with thee <WH398>; neither will I eat bread <WH3899> nor drink <WH8354> water <WH4325> with thee in this place <WH4725>:

for it was said <WH1697> to me by the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068>, Thou shalt eat <WH398> no bread <WH3899> nor drink <WH8354> water <WH4325> there <WH7725>, nor turn again to go <WH3212> by the way <WH1870> that thou camest <WH1980>.

And he said <WH559> unto him <WH5030>, I also am a prophet as thou art <WH4397>; and an angel spake <WH1696> unto me by the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068>, saying <WH559>, Bring him back <WH7725> with thee into thy house <WH1004>, that he may eat <WH398> bread <WH3899> and drink <WH8354> water <WH4325>. But he lied unto him <WH3584>.
So he went back <WH7725> with him <WH398>, and did eat bread <WH3899> in his house <WH1004>, and drank <WH8354> water <WH4325>.
And it came to pass <WH3427>, as they sat at the table <WH7979>, that the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came unto the prophet <WH5030> that brought him back <WH7725>;

and he cried <WH7121> unto the man <WH376> of God <WH430> that came <WH935> from Judah <WH3063>, saying <WH559>, Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>, Forasmuch as <WH3282> thou hast been disobedient <WH4784> unto the mouth <WH6310> of Jehovah <WH3068>, and hast not kept <WH8104> the commandment <WH4687> which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> commanded thee <WH6680>,

but camest back <WH7725>, and hast eaten <WH398> bread <WH3899> and drunk <WH8354> water <WH4325> in the place <WH4725> of which he said <WH1696> to thee <WH398>, Eat no bread <WH3899>, and drink <WH8354> no water <WH4325>; thy body <WH5038> shall not come <WH935> unto the sepulchre <WH6913> of thy fathers <WH1>.

And it came to pass <WH310>, after he had eaten <WH398> bread <WH3899>, and after <WH310> he had drunk <WH8354>, that he saddled <WH2280> for him the ass <WH2543>, to wit <WH5030>, for the prophet whom he had brought back <WH7725>.

And when he was gone <WH3212>, a lion <WH738> met <WH4672> him by the way <WH1870>, and slew <WH4191> him <WH5038>: and his body was cast <WH7993> in the way <WH1870>, and the ass <WH2543> stood <WH5975> by <WH681> it <WH738>; the lion also stood <WH5975> by the body <WH5038>.

And <WH582>, behold, men passed by <WH5674>, and saw <WH7200> the body <WH5038> cast <WH7993> in the way <WH1870>, and the lion <WH738> standing <WH5975> by <WH681> the body <WH5038>; and they came <WH935> and told <WH1696> it in the city <WH5892> where the old <WH2205> prophet <WH5030> dwelt <WH3427>.

And when the prophet <WH5030> that brought him back <WH7725> from the way <WH1870> heard <WH8085> thereof <WH559>, he said, It is the man <WH376> of God <WH430>, who was disobedient <WH4784> unto the mouth <WH6310> of Jehovah <WH3068>: therefore Jehovah <WH3068> hath delivered <WH5414> him unto the lion <WH738>, which hath torn <WH7665> him <WH4191>, and slain him <WH1697>, according to the word of Jehovah <WH3068>, which he spake unto him <WH1696>.
And he spake <WH1696> to his sons <WH1121>, saying <WH559>, Saddle <WH2280> me the ass <WH2543>. And they saddled it <WH2280>.

And he went <WH3212> and found <WH4672> his body <WH5038> cast <WH7993> in the way <WH1870>, and the ass <WH2543> and the lion <WH738> standing <WH5975> by <WH681> the body <WH5038>: the lion <WH738> had not eaten <WH398> the body <WH5038>, nor torn <WH7665> the ass <WH2543>.

And the prophet <WH5030> took up <WH5375> the body <WH5038> of the man <WH376> of God <WH430>, and laid <WH3240> it upon the ass <WH2543>, and brought it back <WH7725>; and he came <WH935> to the city <WH5892> of the old <WH2205> prophet <WH5030>, to mourn <WH5594>, and to bury him <WH6912>.
And he laid <WH3240> his body <WH5038> in his own grave <WH6913>; and they mourned <WH5594> over him <WH1945>, saying, Alas, my brother <WH251>!

And it came to pass <WH310>, after he had buried <WH6912> him <WH559>, that he spake to his sons <WH1121>, saying <WH559>, When I am dead <WH4191>, then bury <WH6912> me in the sepulchre <WH6913> wherein the man <WH376> of God <WH430> is buried <WH6912>; lay <WH3240> my bones <WH6106> beside <WH681> his bones <WH6106>.

For the saying <WH1697> which he cried <WH7121> by the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> against the altar <WH4196> in Beth-el <WH1008>, and against all the houses <WH1004> of the high places <WH1116> which are in the cities <WH5892> of Samaria <WH8111>, shall surely come to pass.

After <WH310> this thing <WH1697> Jeroboam <WH3379> returned <WH7725> not from his evil <WH7451> way <WH1870>, but made <WH6213> again <WH7725> from among all <WH7098> the people <WH5971> priests <WH3548> of the high places <WH1116>: whosoever would <WH2655>, he consecrated <WH4390> him <WH3548>, that there might be priests of the high places <WH1116>.
And this thing <WH1697> became sin <WH2403> unto the house <WH1004> of Jeroboam <WH3379>, even to cut it off <WH3582>, and to destroy <WH8045> it from off the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>.
